string.text: Installation of new lens set for farther distances, which offers x10 magnification power.
Installation of new lens set for farther distances, which offers x15 magnification power.
Installation of new lens set for great distances, which offers x20 magnification power.
ED glass installation that replaces the ordinary lens to minimize the effects of chromatic aberration and secondary spectrum, resulting in better visuals
Night vision technology installation for low light conditions, which relies on night-useful spectral and intensity range techniques to sense radiation that is invisible to a human observer.
An improvment to the night vision technology, which introduces better system light gain, system resolution and photosensitivity to increase the visual quality
Replacements to the housing style in order to reduce the overall weight by implementing an open-bridge and chassis made of an aluminum alloy.
Replacements to the housing style in order to reduce the overall weight by implementing an open-bridge and chassis made of an aluminum alloy.
